mapper.insert: insert into strings_log values (#{gt_id}, #{st_id}, to_timestamp(#{startTs}/1000), to_timestamp(#{endTs}/1000), #{postError}, #{host_fix}, #{port_fix}, #{name_fix}, #{serialNo_fix}, #{fwVersion_fix}, #{comparator_fix}, #{devider_fix}, #{rawPulsesCounter_fix}, #{error}, #{stringVoltage}, #{stringCurrent}, #{temperature}, #{totalWatt}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
